title: Smart Data models Port schema
description: The data model is intended to provide information about ports

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity assigned by the system who created on first the entity. This URN should Conforms MRN & IETF specifically RFC 2141, RFC 5234, and RFC 8141. The propossed format is id::=urn:mrn:<OID>:<ONSS>:port:id:99999999 where OID:= Organisation UN/LOCODE, OONSS:=Organization Name of Service, 9999999 an sequential, unique identifier that the issuer of the PortCall entity will identify on his sistems (i.e. a SQL row-id), i.e. 'urn:mrn:eshuv:portcalls:portcall:id:1422'. See [Unlocode](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/unlocode-code-list-country-and-territory and https://service.unece.org/trade/locode/es.htm)

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Port

countryCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations. See [Unlocode](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/unlocode-code-list-country-and-territory)

portCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Port where the container is discharged (UN/LOCODE: United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations). See [UNTDID - D.95B - Segment LOC - C517 (3225)](https://service.unece.org/trade/untdid/d95b/uncl/uncl3225.htm) and [UN/LOCODE](https://unece.org/trade/cefact/unlocode-code-list-country-and-territory) [EMSWE2:DG-004-04][IALA-S211-portCode][UN-EDIFACT:LOC]

portName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Common name of the port

portType.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. Enum: 'Sea, Inland, Fishing, WarmWater, Dry'. Classification by type of port

portArea.description: GeoProperty. Geojson reference to the item. It can be Polygon or MultiPolygon

timeZone.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The value provided should be among those listed in the IANA Time Zone Database. See [Time Zone Database](https://timezonedb.com/time-zones)

gln.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Global Location Number. See [GLN](https://gs1id.org/global-location-number-gln)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refPortAuthority.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the PortAuthority

portClosed.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. Information about the operational status of the port: closed o open to operations

lastOpenCloseTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of the closure of the Port or the Date and time of last port opening after a closure retpresented by an ISO 8601 UTC format
